comment: First days this week scrambling to find an appointment, told "no appointments available in Toronto". Turn on , find a spot mins away from my place giving jabs asap. From no appointment to half vaxxed in no time.
amr:
# ::snt First days this week scrambling to find an appointment, told "no appointments available in Toronto". Turn on , find a spot mins away from my place giving jabs asap. From no appointment to half vaxxed in no time.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / scramble-01
                  :ARG0 (d / day
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                              :value 1))
                  :ARG1 (f / find-01
                        :ARG0 d
                        :ARG1 (a2 / appointment)))
            :op2 (t / tell-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / available-02
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG2 (a4 / appointment)
                        :location (c / city
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Toronto")))
                  :ARG2 d))
      :snt2 (a5 / and
            :op1 (t2 / turn-on-08
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you))
            :op2 (f2 / find-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (s2 / spot
                        :location (r / relative-position
                              :op1 (p / place
                                    :poss (ii / i))
                              :quant (m2 / multiple
                                    :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (m3 / minute)))))
                  :purpose (g / give-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (j / jabs)
                        :time (a6 / as-apart))))
      :snt3 (r2 / range-01
            :ARG3 (a7 / appointment
                  :polarity -)
            :ARG4 (v / vaxxed
                  :mod (h / half))
            :ARG5 (t4 / time
                  :polarity -)))

comment: I just signed up for a pharmacy's wait list and got an appointment in a couple of days. No sweat
amr:

                        :mod (w / wait-01)

            :op2 (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 ii
